item.title: Hiring Data Analyst - Contractor (R, Google Cloud, Python). Remote OK.
item.description:
Paperchain is an early-stage startup building real-time revenue forecasting and financial tools for the digital media industry using unique applications of data science and blockchain technology.

We’re a looking for a contractor Data Analyst to help build the data onboarding and analytics process for our first customers. This is a contractor role with the plan to transition into a full-time role.
